entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
